snippet.title: A Life in Music - Trailer EN (extended)
snippet.description:
https://www.alifeinmusic.it/
Antonio is a young and introverted composer, fascinated by Verdi's Operas. Silvia is a Radiohead fan and vocalist in her own band. Their meeting will upset their lives.
